army_tradition.description: Adds to the rate of army tradition gained each year.

army_tradition_decay.description: Adds to the decay rate of army tradition.

army_tradition_from_battle.description: Modifies the army tradition bonus when gained through battles.

yearly_army_professionalism.description: Modifies the rate of army professionalism gained each year.

drill_gain_modifier.description: Modifies the army drill gains while drilling

drill_decay_modifier.description: Modifies the army drill decay rate per year.

infantry_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of infantry units.

infantry_power.description: Modifies the power infantry gain from unit pips.

infantry_fire.description: added to infanty fire modifier, a pure multiplier to infantry damage during fire phase

infantry_shock.description: added to infanty shock modifier, a pure multiplier to infantry damage during shock phase

cavalry_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of cavalry units.

cavalry_power.description: Modifies the power cavalry gain from unit pips.

cavalry_fire.description: added to cavalry fire modifier, a pure multiplier to cavalry damage during fire phase

cavalry_shock.description: added to cavalry shock modifier, a pure multiplier to cavalry damage during shock phase

artillery_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of artillery units.

artillery_power.description: Modifies the power artillery gain from unit pips.

artillery_fire.description: added to artillery fire modifier, a pure multiplier to artillery damage during fire phase, also for ship cannons

artillery_shock.description: added to artillery shock modifier, a pure multiplier to artillery damage during shock phase

cav_to_inf_ratio.description: Adds to the ratio required to negate the insufficient support penalty.

cavalry_flanking.description: Modifies the effectiveness of cavalry flanking.

artillery_bonus_vs_fort.description: Adds to the bonus artillery get versus forts.

backrow_artillery_damage.description: Modifies the bonus damage artillery inflict when in the backrow during combat.

discipline.description: Modifies the discipline of land units.

mercenary_discipline.description: Modifies the discipline of mercenary units.

land_morale.description: Modifies the land morale of land units.

defensiveness.description: Modifies the siege defensiveness that affects siege phase length.

siege_ability.description: Modifies the siege ability that affects siege phase length. Reverse concept of defensiveness.

movement_speed.description: Modifies the base movement speed for all land units.

fire_damage.description: Modifies the fire damage done by land units.

fire_damage_received.description: Modifies the fire damage taken by land units.

shock_damage.description: Modifies the shock damage done by land units.

shock_damage_received.description: Modifies the shock damage taken by land units.

recover_army_morale_speed.description: Modifies the army morale recovery speed.

siege_blockade_progress.description: Modifies the bonus siege status by blockaded.

reserves_organisation.description: Modifies the morale damage taken by units in reserves (i.e. not in battle, but engaged with another unit)

land_attrition.description: Modifies the attrition taken by land units.

reinforce_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the cost of reinforcements when units are reinforced.

reinforce_speed.description: Modifies the rate at which units are reinforced with new men.

manpower_recovery_speed.description: Modifies the rate at which manpower is recovered.

global_manpower.description: Adds to the country's total manpower pool. 1 equals 1000 men.

global_manpower_modifier.description: Modifies a country's total manpower pool.

global_regiment_cost.description: Modifies the base unit cost for all land units.

global_regiment_recruit_speed.description: Modifies the base speed at which land units are recruited.

global_supply_limit_modifier.description: Modifies the supply limit of provinces

land_forcelimit.description: Adds to a country's force limit.

land_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the maintenance cost of all land units.

mercenary_cost.description: Modifies the base cost for mercenary units.

merc_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the maintenance cost of all mercenary units.

hostile_attrition.description: Adds to the attrition enemies take in a country's provinces.

garrison_size.description: Modifies the base garrison size in provinces.

global_garrison_growth.description: Modifies the base garrison growth in provinces.

fort_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the base fort maintenance cost.

rival_border_fort_maintenance.description: Modifies the base fort maintenance cost for forts in provinces that border rivals.

war_exhaustion.description: Adds to the monthly war exhaustion rate.

war_exhaustion_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost for reducing war exhaustion.

leader_land_fire.description: Adds to the minimum fire pip count a leader can be generated with.

leader_land_manuever.description: Adds to the minimum maneuver pip count a leader can be generated with.

leader_land_shock.description: Adds to the minimum shock pip count a leader can be generated with.

leader_siege.description: Adds to the minimum siege pip count a leader can be generated with.

general_cost.description: Modifies the base military power cost for recruiting Generals.

free_leader_pool.description: Adds to the maximum amount of free leaders.

raze_power_gain.description: Modifies the amount of monarch power gained from razing.

loot_amount.description: Modifies the amount of loot taken at once during looting.

available_province_loot.description: Modifies the amount of loot available in a province.

prestige_from_land.description: Modifies the prestige bonus from combat.

amount_of_banners.description: Modifies the maximum amount of banners available.

war_taxes_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the military power cost for raising war taxes.

leader_cost.description: Modifies the military power cost for hiring leaders.

may_recruit_female_generals.description: Allows the recruitment of female generals.
may_recruit_female_generals.version_added: 1.11(Only usable in ideas or religions before 1.30)

special_unit_forcelimit.description: Modifies the allowed forcelimit of special units such as Rajput regiments, etc.

manpower_in_true_faith_provinces.description: Modifies the amount of manpower gained from provinces that follow the true faith of a country.

mercenary_manpower.description: Modifies the amount of manpower mercenary companies have.

navy_tradition.description: Adds to the yearly navy tradition rate.

navy_tradition_decay.description: Adds to the decay rate of navy tradition.

naval_tradition_from_battle.description: Modifies the base navy tradition gained from battles.

naval_tradition_from_trade.description: Modifies the base navy tradition gained from protecting trade.

heavy_ship_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of heavy ships.

heavy_ship_power.description: Modifies the power heavy ships gain from unit pips.

light_ship_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of light ships.

light_ship_power.description: Modifies the power light ships gain from unit pips.

galley_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of galley ships.

galley_power.description: Modifies the power galley ships gain from unit pips.

transport_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of transport ships.

transport_power.description: Modifies the power transport ships gain from unit pips.

global_ship_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of all ships.

global_ship_recruit_speed.description: Modifies the base recruitmend speed of all ships.

global_ship_repair.description: Modifies the base repair speed (in port) of all ships.

naval_forcelimit.description: Adds to a country's naval force limit.

naval_forcelimit_modifier.description: Modifies a country's naval force limit.

naval_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the naval maintenance for all ships.

global_sailors.description: Adds to a country's maximum sailor pool.

global_sailors_modifier.description: Modifies a country's maximum sailor pool.

sailor_maintenance_modifer.description: Modifies the sailor maintenance for all ships.

sailors_recovery_speed.description: Modifies the sailor recovery rate for all ships.

blockade_efficiency.description: Modifies the efficiency of blockades against enemies.

capture_ship_chance.description: Adds to the chance for ship capture during naval battles.

global_naval_engagement_modifier.description: Modifies the maximum naval engagement width.

naval_attrition.description: Modifies the naval attrition taken by ships.

naval_morale.description: Modifies the naval morale of all ships.

ship_durability.description: Modifies the durability of all ships.

sunk_ship_morale_hit_recieved.description: Modifies the morale damage taken during battle by losing ships.

recover_navy_morale_speed.description: Modifies the morale recovery rate of ships.

prestige_from_naval.description: Modifies the prestige gained through naval battles.

leader_naval_fire.description: Adds to the minimum fire pip count a leader can be generated with.

leader_naval_manuever.description: Adds to the minimum maneuver pip count a leader can be generated with.

leader_naval_shock.description: Adds to the minimum shock pip count a leader can be generated with.

own_coast_naval_combat_bonus.description: Modifies the combat bonus navies gain when sailing in coastal tiles that border their home nation.

admiral_cost.description: Modifies the cost of hiring an admiral.

movement_speed_onto_off_boat_modifier.description: Modifies the speed at which troops disembark off ships into provinces.

global_naval_barrage_cost.description: Modifies the cost for using the ‘Naval Barrage’ action.

allowed_marine_fraction.description: Modifies the amount of marines allowed to be recruited.

flagship_cost.description: Modifies the cost of building a flagship.

may_perform_slave_raid.description: Allows ships to perform slave raids.
may_perform_slave_raid.version_added: 1.16(Only usable in ideas or religions before 1.30)

may_perform_slave_raid_on_same_religion.description: Grants the abiliy to conduct slave raids against nations that share the same religion.
may_perform_slave_raid_on_same_religion.version_added: 1.27(Only usable in ideas or religions before 1.30)

admiral_skill_gain_modifier.description: The monthly chance that an admiral gains a pip while he is assigned to a fleet that is on a mission and contains a flagship with this modifier

flagship_durability.description: Modifies the ship durability for the flagship.

flagship_morale.description: Modifies the naval morale for the flagship.

flagship_naval_engagement_modifier.description: Modifies the fleet engagement width of the flagship's fleet.

flagship_landing_penalty.description: Modifies the disembarkment penalty for the flagship.

number_of_cannons_flagship_modifier.description: Modifies the number of cannons for the flagship.

naval_maintenance_flagship_modifier.description: Modifies the naval maintenance for the flagship.

trade_power_in_fleet_modifier.description: Modifies the trade power conferred by the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

morale_in_fleet_modifier.description: Modifies the naval morale for the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

blockade_impact_on_siege_in_fleet_modifi.description: Modifies the blockade impact of the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

exploration_mission_range_in_fleet_modif.description: Modifies the exploration mission range for the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

barrage_cost_in_fleet_modifier.description: Modifies the ‘Naval Barrage’ action cost for the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

naval_attrition_in_fleet_modifier.description: Modifies the naval attrition suffered by the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

privateering_efficiency_in_fleet_modifie.description: Modifies the privateering efficiency of the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

prestige_from_battles_in_fleet_modifier.description: Modifies the amount of prestige gained from battles for the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

naval_tradition_in_fleet_modifier.description: Modifies the amount of Naval Tradition gained from battles for the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

cannons_for_hunting_pirates_in_fleet.description: Modifies the amount of cannons for the flagship and all other ships within its fleet whilst on the Hunting Pirates mission.

movement_speed_in_fleet_modifier.description: Modifies the movement speed for the flagship and all other ships within its fleet.

diplomats.description: Adds to a country's diplomat count.

diplomatic_reputation.description: Adds to a country's diplomatic reputation.

diplomatic_upkeep.description: Adds to the maximum number of free diplomatic relations.

envoy_travel_time.description: Modifies diplomat travel time during actions.

fabricate_claims_cost.description: Modifies spy network cost for fabricating claim.

improve_relation_modifier.description: Modifies the speed of the ‘Improve Relations’ diplomatic action.

vassal_forcelimit_bonus.description: Modifies the bonus to a country's forcelimit from their subjects.

vassal_income.description: Modifies the bonus to a country's income from their subjects.

ae_impact.description: Modifies the total size of aggressive expansion gained during actions that confer it.

claim_duration.description: Modifies the duration of claims. (not uses in vanilla)

diplomatic_annexation_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost for annexation.

province_warscore_cost.description: Modifies the warscore cost for taking provinces.

unjustified_demands.description: Modifies the weighting of demands in peace treaties.

enemy_core_creation.description: Modifies the cost of coring provinces for enemies that have your cores.

rival_change_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost to change rivals.

justify_trade_conflict_cost.description: Modifies the spy network cost to justify trade conflicts.

stability_cost_to_declare_war.description: Modifies the stability cost to declare war. Default is 0 with a casus belli and no truce.

global_tax_income.description: Adds to the base tax income per year (i.e. 12 equals 1 extra per month).

global_tax_modifier.description: Modifies the base tax income by a percentage.

production_efficiency.description: Modifies the base production income by a percentage.

state_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the maintenance cost for states.

inflation_action_cost.description: Modifies the administrative power cost for reducing inflation.

inflation_reduction.description: Adds to the base yearly inflation reduction rate.

interest.description: Adds to the base interest rate.

development_cost.description: Modifies the development cost for provinces.

administrative_efficiency.description: Modifies the base core creation cost, diplo-annexation costs and the impact of province development on overextension and warscore cost.

core_creation.description: Modifies the base core creation cost.

core_decay_on_your_own.description: Modifies the rate at which the cores of a country will decay when under the ownership of a different country.

<tech>_cost_modifier.description:
Modifies the monarch power cost of <tech> technologies.
Generated automatically for all technology tables in /Europa Universalis IV/common/technology.txt.

technology_cost.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of all technologies.

idea_cost.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of purchasable ideas.

embracement_cost.description: Modifies the ducat cost for embracing an institution.

global_institution_spread.description: Modifies the rate of spread for institutions in all owned provinces.

institution_spread_from_true_faith.description: Modifies the rate of spread for institutions in owned provinces following the owner's religion.

native_advancement_cost.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of native advancements.

all_power_cost.description: Modifies the monarch power cost of every action that costs monarch power.

innovativeness_gain.description: Modifies the amount of innovativeness gained

free_adm_policy.description: Modifies the amount of free administrative policies.

free_dip_policy.description: Modifies the amount of free diplomatic policies.

free_mil_policy.description: Modifies the amount of free military policies.

possible_adm_policy.description: Modifies the amount of administrative policy slots.

possible_dip_policy.description: Modifies the amount of diplomatic policy slots.

possible_mil_policy.description: Modifies the amount of military policy slots.

possible_policy.description: Modifies the amount of all policy slots.

free_policy.description: Modifies the amount of policy slots.

country_admin_power.description: Modifies the monthly administrative power a country generates.

country_diplomatic_power.description: Modifies the monthly diplomatic power a country generates.

country_military_power.description: Modifies the monthly military power a country generates.

prestige.description: Adds to the base yearly rate of prestige.

prestige_decay.description: Adds to the base rate of prestige decay.

monthly_splendor.description: Adds to the monthly rate of splendor points.

yearly_corruption.description: Adds to the yearly rate of corruption.

advisor_cost.description: Modifies the base cost of advisors.

advisor_pool.description: Adds to the pool size for advisors.

female_advisor_chance.description: Modifies the base chance rate for female advisors.

heir_chance.description: Modifies the base chance for an heir during the heir generation tick.

block_introduce_heir.description: Disallows the country to use the 'Introduce New Heir' interaction.

monarch_admin_power.description:
Adds to the base ADM skill a ruler, heir and consort can be generated with.
Does not affect rulers created with fixed = yes.

monarch_diplomatic_power.description:
Adds to the base DIP skill a ruler, heir and consort can be generated with.
Does not affect rulers created with fixed = yes.

monarch_military_power.description:
Adds to the base MIL skill a ruler, heir and consort can be generated with.
Does not affect rulers created with fixed = yes.

adm_advisor_cost.description: Modifies the cost of hiring an administrative advisor.

dip_advisor_cost.description: Modifies the cost of hiring an diplomatic advisor.

mil_advisor_cost.description: Modifies the cost of hiring an military advisor.

monthly_support_heir_gain.description: Modifies the monthly gain in support for the heir of a country in an country that uses the ‘Elective Monarchy’ mechanics.

power_projection_from_insults.description: Modifies the amount of power projection gained when using the ‘Insult’ diplomatic action.

monarch_lifespan.description: Modifies the average lifespan of a ruler.

yearly_absolutism.description: Adds to the yearly base rate of absolutism.

max_absolutism.description: Adds to the maximum value of absolutism. Internally absolutism bonuses do not scale above 100.

legitimacy.description:
Adds to the yearly rate of legitimacy.
Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use legitimacy.

republican_tradition.description:
Adds to the yearly rate of republican tradition.
Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use republican tradition.

devotion.description:
Adds to the yearly rate of devotion.
Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use devotion.

horde_unity.description:
Adds to the yearly rate of horde unity.
Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use horde unity.

meritocracy.description: Adds to the yearly rate of meritocracy. Does not appear or have an effect if a country's government does not use meritocracy.

monthly_militarized_society.description: Adds to the monthly rate of militarisation for governments with the militarisation mechanic.

yearly_tribal_allegiance.description: Adds to the yearly rate of tribal allegiance for governments with the tribal allegiance mechanic.

<faction>_influence.description:
Adds to the monthly rate of faction influence.
Generated automatically for all factions in /Europa Universalis IV/common/factions.

imperial_mandate.description: Adds to the rate of Mandate gained per month.

election_cycle.description: Adds to the duration of an election cycle for the current nation. Negative values shorten the duration, positive values add to it.

candidate_random_bonus.description: Adds to the randomized stats a republican candidate may receive during elections.

reelection_cost.description: Modifies the cost in Republican Tradition when re-electing candidates.

reform_progress_growth.description: Adds to the rate of government reform progress gain.

governing_capacity.description: Adds to the base governing capacity.

state_governing_cost.description: Modifies the governing capacity usage of states.

trade_company_governing_cost.description: Modifies the governing capacity usage of trade companies.

expand_administration_cost.description: Modifies the cost of the ‘Expand Administration’ action.

yearly_revolutionary_zeal.description: Adds to the yearly base rate of revolutionary zeal.

max_revolutionary_zeal.description: Adds to the maximum value of revolutionary zeal. Internally revolutionary zeal bonuses do not scale above 100.

<estate>_influence_modifier.description: Modifies to the influence of the specified estate.

<estate>_loyalty_modifier.description: Modifies to the loyalty equilibrium of the specified estate.

imperial_authority.description: Modifies the impact of imperial authority gains.

imperial_authority_value.description: Adds to the rate of imperial authority gained per month.

free_city_imperial_authority.description: Adds to the rate of imperial authority gained per month from Free Cities.

imperial_mercenary_cost.description: Modifies the cost of mercenary companies for nations within the Holy Roman Empire.

max_free_cities.description: Adds to the maximum number of free cities allowed.

max_electors.description: Adds to the maximum number of electors allowed.

legitimate_subject_elector.description: Adds to the elector desire for the current country to become Emperor (if they are a valid choice).

culture_conversion_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost for culture conversion in provinces.

num_accepted_cultures.description: Adds to the maximum number of accepted cultures a country can have.

same_culture_advisor_cost.description: Modifies the advisor cost for advisors that share the same culture as the country's court they're in.

promote_culture_cost.description: Modifies the diplomatic power cost for promoting a culture.

global_unrest.description: Adds to the base unrest value.

stability_cost_modifier.description: Modifies the administrative power cost of raising stability.

global_autonomy.description: Adds to the monthly rate of autonomy in owned provinces.

min_autonomy.description: Sets the minimum autonomy level allowed in all owned provinces.

autonomy_change_time.description: Modifies the cooldown for the autonomy reduction and increase buttons.

harsh_treatment_cost.description: Modifies the military power cost for using harsh treatment.

years_of_nationalism.description: Adds to the base separatism value of provinces when conquered.

min_autonomy_in_territories.description: Modifies the minimum autonomy experienced in territories.

unrest_catholic_provinces.description: Modifies the local unrest in all provinces of the catholic religion

liberty_desire.description: Adds to subject liberty desire against their overlord.

liberty_desire_from_subject_development.description: Modifies the subject liberty desire from development against their overlord (Note: Tooltip is bugged as of 1.29. A modifier of -0.2 shows as "-0.20%" when it reduces it by 20%).

reduced_liberty_desire.description: Adds to the liberty desire subjects have against their overlord. Applied to the overlord.

reduced_liberty_desire_on_same_continent.description: Adds to the liberty desire subjects have against their overlord if on the same continent. Applied to the overlord.

spy_offence.description: Modifies the base effectiveness of spies against enemies.

global_spy_defence.description: Modifies the base effectiveness of counter-espionage against enemy spies.

discovered_relations_impact.description: Modifies the relations impact applied to a country when discovered committing an espionage action.

rebel_support_efficiency.description: Modifies the effectiveness of supported rebels in other countries.

global_missionary_strength.description: Adds to the base missionary strength against all religions.

global_heretic_missionary_strength.description: Adds to the base missionary strength against heretic religions.

missionaries.description: Adds to the base missionary count for a country.

missionary_maintenance_cost.description: Modifies the cost of missionary maintenance whilst converting provinces.

religious_unity.description: Adds to the base religious unity value for a country.

tolerance_own.description: Adds to the base tolerance for the true faith within a country.

tolerance_heretic.description: Adds to the base tolerance for heretics within a country.

tolerance_heathen.description: Adds to the base tolerance for heathens within a country.

papal_influence.description: Adds to the rate of papal influence gained per year.

church_power_modifier.description: Modifies the effectiveness of church power gains.

monthly_fervor_increase.description: Adds to the rate of fervor gained per month.

harmonization_speed.description: Modifies the rate at which harmonization occurs.

yearly_harmony.description: Adds to the rate of harmony gained per year.

monthly_piety.description: Adds to the rate of piety gained per month.

monthly_karma.description: Adds to the rate of karma gained per month.

enforce_religion_cost.description: Modifies the war score cost for the Enforce Religion peace term.

prestige_per_development_from_conversion.description: Adds to the prestige bonus gained per development when successfully converting a province to a state religion.

warscore_cost_vs_other_religion.description: Modifies the war score costs for peace terms whilst in war against countries of a different religion.

establish_order_cost.description: Modifies the cost for using the ‘Establish Order’ action.

global_religious_conversion_resistance.description: Adds to conversion resistance from centres of reformation in all provinces.

relation_with_heretics.description: Adds to the opinion modifier between a country and heretic countries.

curia_treasury_contribution.description: Modifies the amount of treasury contribution to the Curia.

curia_powers_cost.description: Modifies the papal influence cost of the curia actions.

yearly_patriarch_authority.description: Adds to the amount of yearly patriarch authority gained.

cb_on_religious_enemies.description: Acts a visible script flag. Can be checked in triggers with cb_on_religious_enemies = yes
cb_on_religious_enemies.version_added: 1.1(Only usable in ideas or religions before 1.30)

global_heathen_missionary_strength.description: Adds to the base missionary strength against heathen religions.

colonists.description: Modifies the base colonist count for a country.

colonist_placement_chance.description: Adds to the base colonial placement chance for colonists, which is the chance that additional settlers will be spawned whilst the colonist is present.

global_colonial_growth.description: Adds to the base yearly colonial growth gain.

range.description: Modifies the base colonisation range, used for exploration, colonisation and coring province that border sea.

native_uprising_chance.description: Adds to the chance of native uprisings in a colony province.

native_assimilation.description: Modifies the bonus from assimilation in colonies. Native assimilation is bonus to goods produced depends on the native population.

migration_cooldown.description: Modifies the cooldown for the migration action for primitive nations that can migrate.

global_tariffs.description: Modifies the tariff income from colonial nations.

treasure_fleet_income.description: Modifies the income from treasure fleets sent by colonial nations.

expel_minorities_cost.description: Modifies the cost of using the ‘Expel Minorities’ action.

caravan_power.description: Modifies the bonus trade power inland nodes receive from trade power sources.

merchants.description: Adds to the base merchant count for a country.

placed_merchant_power.description: Modifies the additional trade power when a merchant present in a trade node.

global_trade_power.description: Modifies the trade power in all trade nodes for a country.

global_foreign_trade_power.description: Modifies the trade power for a country in trade nodes that are not domestic.

global_own_trade_power.description: Modifies the trade power for a country in trade nodes that are domestic.

global_prov_trade_power_modifier.description: Modifies the base trade power of owned provinces.

global_trade_goods_size_modifier.description: Modifies the base trade good size of owned provinces.

trade_efficiency.description: Modifies a country's trade income. (Maximum is 200%)

trade_range_modifier.description: Modifies the trade range used to determine if a country can place a merchant in a trade node.

trade_steering.description: Modifies the bonus to trade power used for steering when determining which outgoing node trade is steered to. If you have a merchant present, it also slightly increases the outgoing value.

global_ship_trade_power.description: Modifies the trade power ships grant when protecting trade.

privateer_efficiency.description: Modifies the effectiveness of privateers in a trade node.

embargo_efficiency.description: Modifies the effectiveness of embargoing another country.

ship_power_propagation.description: Modifies the propagation of trade power from ships protecting trade.

center_of_trade_upgrade_cost.description: Modifies the cost of upgrading a center of trade in a province.

trade_company_investment_cost.description: Modifies the cost of purchasing a trade company investment in a state.

mercantilism_cost.description: Modifies the cost of the ‘Boost Mercantilism’ action.

institution_growth.description: Modifies the annual growth of all institutions in a province by the specified value. Is not scaled by province development level

max_attrition.description: Adds to the maximum attrition that can be experienced in a province.

attrition.description: Adds to the base attrition in a province.

local_hostile_attrition.description: Adds to the base attrition for enemies in a province.

fort_level.description: Adds to the fort level in a province, determining how difficult it is to siege.

garrison_growth.description: Modifies the rate of garrison growth in a province.

local_defensiveness.description: Modifies the defensiveness of a province, impacting siege phase length.

local_friendly_movement_speed.description: Modifies the movement speed of units in a province that are considered friendly.

local_hostile_movement_speed.description: Modifies the movement speed of units in a province that are considered enemies.

local_manpower.description: Adds to the base manpower value. 1 equals 1000 men.

local_manpower_modifier.description: Modifies the manpower efficiency in a province.

local_regiment_cost.description: Modifies the recruitment cost of land units in a province.

regiment_recruit_speed.description: Modifies the recruitment speed of land units in a province.

supply_limit.description: Adds to the base supply limit of a province.

supply_limit_modifier.description: Modifies the supply limit efficiency of a province.

local_amount_of_banners.description: Modiifes the amount of banners that can be raised from a province.

local_naval_engagement_modifier.description: Modifies the naval engagement width in a province. Only usable in sea provinces.

local_sailors.description: Adds to the sailors value for a province. 1 equals 1 sailor.

local_sailors_modifier.description: Modifies the sailors efficiency of a province.

local_ship_cost.description: Modifies the cost of ship recruitment in a province.

local_ship_repair.description: Modifies the speed of ship repair in a province.

ship_recruit_speed.description: Modifies the recruitment speed of ships in a province.

blockade_force_required.description: Modifies the number of ships required to fully blockade the province.

hostile_disembark_speed.description: Modifies the speed of disembarkation by hostile troops into the province.

hostile_fleet_attrition.description: Modifies the amount of fleet attrition experienced by hostile ships in sea zones adjacent to the province.

local_colonial_growth.description: Adds to the colonial growth in a colony province.

local_colonist_placement_chance.description: Adds to the placement chance in a colony province.

inflation_reduction_local.description: Adds to the base yearly inflation value. Requires every province in a country to have the modifier to work however.

local_state_maintenance_modifier.description: Modifies the state maintenance cost for the state that a province belongs to.

local_build_cost.description: Modifies the cost of constructing buildings in a province.

local_build_time.description: Modifies the construction speed of buildings in a province.

local_monthly_devastation.description: Adds to the devastation rate in a province.

local_production_efficiency.description: Modifies the production efficiency in a province.

local_tax_modifier.description: Modifies the tax efficiency in a province.

tax_income.description: Adds to the yearly tax income of a province.

allowed_num_of_buildings.description: Adds to the maximum number of building slots in a province.

local_development_cost.description:
Modifies the monarch power cost for development in a province.
Converts to local_tax_modifier in for non-Common Sense owners.

local_institution_spread.description: Modifies the spread of institutions in a province.

local_core_creation.description: Modifies the cost of coring in a province.

local_governing_cost.description: Modifies the local governing capacity usage of the province.

statewide_governing_cost.description: Modifies the local governing capacity usage of all provinces in the state of the province.

province_trade_power_modifier.description: Modifies the trade power efficiency in a province.

province_trade_power_value.description: Adds to the trade power in a province.

trade_goods_size_modifier.description: Modifies the goods produced efficiency in a province.

trade_goods_size.description: Adds to the trade good size in a province

trade_value_modifier.description: Modifies the base trade value in a province.

trade_value.description: Adds to the base trade value in a province.

local_missionary_strength.description: Adds to the missionary strength in a province. 1 equals 100% strength.

local_religious_unity_contribution.description: Adds to the religious unity contribution made by a province.

local_missionary_maintenance_cost.description: Adds to the missionary maintenance cost for converting a province.

local_religious_conversion_resistance.description: Adds to conversion resistance from Centres of Reformation.

local_culture_conversion_cost.description: Modifies the culture conversion cost in a province.

local_unrest.description: Adds to the unrest value in a province.

local_autonomy.description: Adds to the autonomy rate in a province.

local_years_of_nationalism.description: Adds to the base nationalism value in a province.

min_local_autonomy.description: Sets the minimum autonomy value a province can have.

attack_bonus_in_capital_terrain.description: Grants attack bonus in provinces with the same terrain as capital province.

can_bypass_forts.description: Allows units to ignore fort zones of control.

can_chain_claim.description: Allows claims to be enacted through already claimed provinces.

can_colony_boost_development.description: Grants bonus 1 tax, production and manpower on completed colonies.

can_transfer_vassal_wargoal.description: Allows usage of the ‘Transfer Subject’ peace term at half cost.

force_march_free.description: Allows usage of the ‘Force March’ action for free.

free_maintenance_on_expl_conq.description: Removes maintenance cost for explorers and conquisadors.

ignore_coring_distance.description: Allows coring in any uncored province, regardless of distance.

cb_on_government_enemies.description: Acts a visible script flag. Can be checked in triggers with cb_on_government_enemies = yes

cb_on_primitives.description: Allows claims to be fabricated on overseas provinces in colonial regions.

cb_on_overseas.description: Allows claims to be fabricated on overseas provinces in trade company regions.

idea_claim_colonies.description: Allows claims to be fabricated on overseas provinces in colonial regions that are owned by another nation that is also overseas.

may_explore.description: Allows the recruitment of explorers and conquisadors.

no_religion_penalty.description: Removes the penalties associated with negative religious tolerance.

reduced_stab_impacts.description: Reduces the stability hits when taking diplomatic actions that cause them (i.e. ‘Break Marriage’).

sea_repair.description: Allows ships to repair in coastal sea zones adjacent to owned provinces.

may_establish_frontier.description: Allows the usage of the Siberean frontier mechanic.

extra_manpower_at_religious_war.description: Grants an increase in manpower recovery by a factor of 3 during religious wars.

auto_explore_adjacent_to_colony.description: Grants the abiliy to automatically discover undiscovered provinces adjacent to colonies.

can_fabricate_for_vassals.description: Grants the abiliy to fabricate claims for vassals.

has_banners.description: Allows the usage of Manchu banner units. Country scope.

local_has_banners.description: Allows Manchu banner units to be raised in owned provinces. Province scope.
